cards.front: A 1773 protest against British taxes in which Boston colonists disguised as Mohawks dumped valuable tea into Boston Harbor.
Heroine of the American Revolution who carried water to soldiers and took over her husband's gun when he was wounded, real name was Mary Ludwig Hays.
1st President of the United States; commander-in-chief of the Continental Army during the American Revolution (1732-1799)
Colonial militia members who were supposed to be ready to fight at a minute's notice
Agreement signed by British and American leaders that stated the United States of America was a free and independent contry
